name: Spark Vs The Marshmallows
description:
Spark Vs the Marshmallows is a 4 Player Plug-and-Play co-op/solo adventure where you fights marshmallows, save your fellow flames, and explore a variety of different environments and face off against music based boss battles! Overall this game is a mix of platforming, boss fighting, combat, and exploration! As you progress through each level, you encounter different types of marshmallows and find unique abilities!
  • Local Multiplayer: Play with up to 4 players locally.
Fire Swing



Unlockable Abilities for Spark the Tiny Flame:
  • Fire Sling (Melee): A ball of fire that shoots around the player and slings back.
  • Fire Dash (Movement): Burst of fire shoots out of behind the player resulting in boosting forward.
  • Fire Ball (Range): A Fireball shoots out of the player and uses fuel.
  • Fire Swing (Movement): Grapple onto hooks instantly and swing around gaining velocity to parkour yourself around levels.

MUSICAL BOSS FIGHTS: (Each with unique attacks, abilities, and weaknesses)
  • Marshmallow Dance Battle
  • The Giant Thumper Marshmallow
  • The Smore Cannon
  • The Rocky Road Ice-cream





Level Progression: Advance through 11 levels, each with distinct themes and challenges
  • The Digsite
  • The Railroad
  • Disco Battle
  • Ninja Town
  • The Thumper Boss
  • Chocolate Gates
  • Chocolate Caverns
  • Swings
  • The Smore Cannon
  • Tubes
  • Rocky Road



Cosmetics:
  • Orange, blue, green, pink, purple, white, neon orange, neon blue, neon red, neon pink, gold, and black fire
